title: I'm so mad I didn't get invited to use the alpha client
body: My aunt who hasn't played the game for nearly as long as me (probably half a year), got chosen to use the client. But I, the forever High gold season 2 player haven't been chosen. WHAT GIVES RITO?

replies.body:
Our [Alpha Client FAQ](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/206201070-Alpha-Client-FAQ) states this:

>"Alpha access is limited to level 30 (at least to start) players with no history of negative in-game behavior. All gaming rigs are welcome, although since the client won't be perfectly optimized at the alphaâ€™s start, players with lower-spec machines won't be prioritized early on."

I'm sure just like the PBE, we look for really active players who are a positive influence on the community. Wait time will not directly impact how quickly or if someone will get accepted.

Let me know if you have any other questions.
